page.title: List of most visited art museums in the world

revisions.rev:
[[File:Le Louvre - Aile Richelieu.jpg|thumb|right|The Louvre palace (Richelieu wing)]] [[File:British Museum from NE 2.JPG|thumb|right|British Museum, London, United Kingdom]] [[File:Metropolitan Museum of Art entrance NYC.JPG|thumb|Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City, United States]] [[File:National Gallery, London.jpg|thumb|right|National Gallery, London, United Kingdom]] [[File:Tate-modern-london.jpg|thumb|right|Tate Modern, London, United Kingdom]] [[File:National Gallery of Art - West Building.JPG|thumb|right|National Gallery, Washington, D.C., United States]] [[File:MuseeDOrsay.jpg|thumb|right|MusÃ©e d'Orsay, Paris, France]] [[File:Museo del Prado (Madrid) 04.jpg|thumb|right|Museo del Prado, Madrid, Spain]] [[File:National Museum of Korea.jpg|thumb|right|National Museum of Korea, Seoul, South Korea]] [[File:ZimnÃ­ palÃ¡c (3).jpg|thumb|right|Hermitage Museum, Saint Petersburg, Russia]] [[File:Athens acropolis museum during sunset.jpg|thumb|The Athens Acropolis Museum, Athens, Greece]] [[File:10 The High.jpg|thumb|The High Museum of Art, Atlanta, United States]] This article '''lists the most visited [[art museum]]s in the world''' (i.e. all museums with any form of art on display, some museums such as the [[Natural History Museum]] are excluded). This list of 100 is based on "2010 worldwide museum attendance numbers" compiled by ''[[The Art Newspaper]]'' published in April 2011.<ref name=AN>{{cite web|url=http://www.theartnewspaper.com/attfig/attfig10.pdf|title=Exhibition and museum attendance figures 2010 (page 2)|publisher=[[The Art Newspaper]]|location=London|format=PDF|date=April 2011|accessdate=April 2011}}</ref> The country with the highest number of visitors in the top 100 is the [[United Kingdom]]. The country with the most museums appearing in the top 100 is the [[United States]]. Several major art museums, such as the [[Palace Museum]] in [[Beijing]], which annually draws 7 million visitors,<ref>[http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/28816062/ns/travel-destinations/ Asia's most-visited tourist site]</ref><ref>[http://www.worldheritagesite.org/tags/tag352.html World Heritage Sites with one million visitors or more]</ref> the [[MusÃ©e d'Histoire de France]] in the [[Palace of Versailles]] with 5,659,606 annual visitors in 2009,<ref name="MusÃ©ostat 2009">{{PDF}}{{Lien web|url=http://www.developpementculturel.culture.gouv.fr/MUSEOSTAT_2009.pdf|title=MusÃ©ostat 2009|site=DÃ©veloppement culturel, MinistÃ¨re de la Culture et de la Communication|consultÃ© le=5 juillet 2011}}</ref> the [[Vatican Museums]] of [[Rome]], with 4,310,083 visitors in 2007,<ref name="touring.it">[http://www.touring.it/Pdf/dossier/Musei2008.pdf Dossier Musei 2008 - Touring Club Italiano]</ref> and the [[National Palace Museum]] in [[Taipei]], with 3,441,238 visitors in 2010,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.npm.gov.tw/UserFiles/File/zh-tw/335000000E-I52-149.pdf|title=National Palace Museum Annual Report 2010|publisher=National Palace Museum|page=59|format=PDF|date=April 2011|accessdate=2011-05-30}}</ref> were not included.
